items.name: init(date: Date)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider for displaying the specified time.

items.name: init(date: Date, timeZone: TimeZone?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider for displaying the specified time.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The date object containing the time value.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone used to format time values.
